Peek - Screen Recorder & Screenshot 

The ultimate screen capture tool for your desktop. 
With Peek, you can easily record your screen as a gif, mp4 or take a single image with just a few taps. 
Enhance your captures with our powerful annotation feature. Whether you're creating a tutorial, showcasing your gameplay, or just want to save a funny social media post, Peek has you covered. 

Features:
- Record your screen as a gif or mp4
- Take a single image
- Annotate your captures with text, shapes, and more
- Record full screen or a custom region
- Adjustible quality, frame rate, and more
